example.text: The Biden Administration is now incentivizing illegal immigration by releasing migrants into the US without a court date to process their asylum claim. This is a free-for-all. [[url]]

It’s imperative that we recognize and support our law enforcement officers. I’m proud that my legislation to recognize police week has received bipartisan support and is set to pass the House of Representatives tonight. [[url]]

The American people spoke, & Republicans listened. As vice chairman of the Committee on Homeland Security I am proud to have cosponsored HR 2, a bill that takes a strong step towards securing our southern border. Republicans are leading the charge to end Biden’s Border Crisis. [[url]]

Even before she served in Congress, Representative Omar made troubling statements. For example, in 2012, Representative Omar tweeted, "Israel has hypnotized the world, may Allah awaken the people and help them see the evil doings of Israel."

The American people spoke, & Republicans listened. As vice chairman of the Committee on Homeland Security I am proud to have cosponsored HR 2, a bill that takes a strong step towards securing our southern border. Republicans are leading the charge to end Biden’s Border Crisis. [[url]]

As a former Member of the Committee on Foreign Affairs, I believe Representative Ilhan Omar disqualified herself from serving on this important committee by making statements attacking people of Jewish faith, as well as trivializing our American heroes and the worst attack on American soil. As Chairman of the House Ethics Committee, I managed this legislation on the House Floor to remove Representative Omar from the Committee on Foreign Affairs and uphold the standard the people of our great nation expect from their elected officials.

The American people spoke, & Republicans listened. As vice chairman of the Committee on Homeland Security I am proud to have cosponsored HR 2, a bill that takes a strong step towards securing our southern border. Republicans are leading the charge to end Biden’s Border Crisis. [[url]]
